name: Song Hou
story: Qiu Hou was born in a small village in China. He was raised in a Buddhist family and learned the teachings of Buddha from a young age. Qiu always had a passion for helping others, which is what inspired him to join the military as a paramedic. He is married to his high school sweetheart and they have two children together. Despite the chaos of war, Qiu remains calm and methodical in his duties, striving to save as many lives as possible.
